title: Zero Waste Cities Program
summary: Supporting Indonesian cities in developing comprehensive zero waste roadmaps and community engagement programs

title: Ocean Plastic Prevention
summary: Beach clean-ups, research, and advocacy to prevent plastic waste from entering marine ecosystems across Indonesian coastlines

title: Corporate Waste Management Solutions
summary: End-to-end waste management services for businesses, including segregation training, collection, and transparent reporting

title: Community Waste Bank Network
summary: Empowering households to segregate and exchange recyclables for savings while building circular economy awareness

title: Refill Station Expansion Program
summary: Building a nationwide network of 500+ refill stations for package-free shopping across Indonesian cities

title: Plastic-Free Seas Campaign
summary: Multi-year advocacy campaign to eliminate single-use plastics and establish Extended Producer Responsibility legislation

title: Youth Environmental Education
summary: School programs and youth workshops empowering the next generation to champion zero waste practices

title: Smart Waste Data Platform
summary: AI-powered waste tracking and analytics system helping cities optimize collection routes and diversion programs
